intro.text: Hello! I'm Viktoriia, a passionate linguist and dedicated English tutor from Ukraine. My love for language has taken me across Europe, from the canals of Venice to the forests of Germany and the shores of the UK. These experiences haven't just taught me about grammar and vocabulary; they've taught me about connection, culture, and the power of communication.
